detail_desc: Padded parka in woven fabric with reflective details. Lined, drawstring hood with a detachable faux fur trim and adjustable hook and loop tab at the back, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, flap patch pockets with a hook and loop fastening and one inner pocket. Inner ribbing and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Lined. Polyester filling.
Cropped vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back.
Slightly shorter top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Hair scarves in an airy, patterned weave that can be tied around the head or neck. Size 11x110 cm.
Short dress in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Top in jersey crêpe with draping. Wrapover front with a deep V-neck, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the hem.
Triangular silicone push-up inserts for use in a triangle bikini.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Small embroidery detail at the bottom of one sleeve.
Dungaree dress in patterned stretch twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides and pockets front and back.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine-knit mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short necklace in metal with small round pendants. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a lace yoke and an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length lace sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam and sewn-in tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Wide top in soft, crêped viscose jersey with short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Boxer shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Short, straight-cut dress in a cotton weave with a concealed zip at the back and short, pleated sleeves. Unlined.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and adjustable straps with a metal fastener. Front chest pocket, side and back pockets, tapered legs and buttons at the sides.
Short cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening with a concealed button at the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, a decorative belt with a metal buckle, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Tunic in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with a tab and button. Braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a deep, raw-edge neckline and short sleeves with raw edges.

Short, wide dress in patterned chiffon with a mandarin collar, opening at the top and ties at the neckline. Gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a gathered seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Satin lining.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with uneven, raw-edge hems.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Pull-on trousers in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Fabric-covered scrunchie with a large bow.
Vest top in ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and a racer back. The cotton content of the top is organic.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Rain coat in water-repellent fabric with welded seams, a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front and flap patch pockets with a press-stud. Unlined.
Two pairs of longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Patterned swimsuit with a slight sheen, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a lined gusset.
Top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim approx. 10 cm.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Fully lined tankini top with a V-neck, draped front section, moulded, lightly padded, moulded cups and wide, adjustable multiway shoulder straps.
Lace cardigan in a relaxed fit with long dolman sleeves. No fasteners.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Polo-neck jumper in a textured knit with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Poncho in a soft wool weave with open sides and a fringed hem. No fasteners. Length at the front and back approx. 90 cm.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in soft, thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, chin guard, long raglan sleeves and contrasting colour trims at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and trim at the hems.
Trousers in a lightweight weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Fitted, straight-style top in soft jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and a detachable belt with metal rings. Side pockets and long sleeves with with a tab and press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Pleats at the front, shaping darts at the back, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and legs with creases.
Scarf in a soft, checked weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 50x190 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim for maximum mobility. Worn details with patches on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a patterned viscose weave with pleats at the top, wide elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets.
Single-breasted jacket in a linen and viscose weave with notch lapels and flap welt front pockets. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Playsuit in woven fabric with decorative lace trims and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, smocking at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Unlined.
Slightly shorter, gently fitted jacket in a textured bouclé weave with metal buttons down the front. Satin lining.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. 5-pocket jeans in washed organic cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with a seam at the hems. The hems are reinforced with canvas on the inside and have a slit at the back and a raw edge.
Narrow, reversible belt with a metal buckle. One side in leather, the other in suede. Width 3 cm.
Short, A-line dress in pleated jersey with a round neckline, small opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Top in soft viscose jersey with long puff sleeves and gathered side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Boots in imitation leather with a quilted shaft in woven fabric and a zip on the inside. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Fully lined bikini top with a tie detail at the front, underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers in fabric with a glittery finish with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and patches on the inside of the legs. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Playsuit in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a low-cut back, gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with a frill around the armholes.
Pyjama top and shorts in cotton jersey. Top with a print motif and appliqués on the front and short, flounced sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in stretch viscose jersey with a draped neckline and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Pleats in the sides for a fitted style and draped effect.
Long-sleeved kimono in a viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Drawstring with ties at the sides, side pockets and slits in the sides of the hem.
Wide jumper in a cool, fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long, narrow sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Cold shoulder blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves. Elastication and a small frill trim at the top, an opening with ties at the front and a lace-trimmed hem.
Patterned bikini with frills and glittery trims. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a lined front. Fully lined bottoms with a frill at the top.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Wide, trousers in pleated, heavily draping satin with a high waist and a concealed zip at the back.
Polo shirt in jacquard-patterned premium cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
